adc6438e-7fd6-4f23-af36-b633696378f2.description: In the midst of the current health crisis, we believe it’s important for everyone to have a strong grasp of infection prevention best practice. This accredited Certificate of Infection Control and Barrier Protection Proficiency (CICBP) course addresses all major elements of infection prevention. It focuses on pragmatic prevention processes in clinical healthcare environments and includes a special module focused specifically on CMS guidelines for infection prevention as it relates to COVID-19.
adc6438e-7fd6-4f23-af36-b633696378f2.name: Infection Control and Barrier Protection Proficiency

2d9526fd-6758-46f9-b4ef-9ceabfa04415.description: Earners have completed three classes that teach them how to design and create wearable jewelry pieces that incorporate metalsmithing, metal clay, and beading techniques. They understand design principles, creative and conceptual thinking, and have a network of peers to help continue practicing and creating after they complete the series. It is the third of three levels of the Lifelong Learning Jewelry Maker SERIES.

b00af492-7c19-4949-bef6-5bd86eb9ef1a.description: This program can prepare students to become a Medical Transcriptionist and a Medical Transcription Editor.
